document.full_text: facing mounting criticism, the badminton world federation announced sunday that it was scrapping a rule that would have forced women to wear skirts or dresses in elite competition.
document.title: sports briefing | badminton: badminton group kills controversial dress code rule
lines_and_colors: facing mounting criticism, the badminton world federation announced sunday that it was scrapping a rule that would have forced women to wear skirts or dresses in elite competition.
